    • Method Detail

      • getAllRoles

        Role[] getAllRoles()
        Returns a set of all roles which can be searched for, sorted by name.
        Returns:
        an array containing the possible roles.

      • getRoles

        IQueryBeanResult getRoles(boolean isCarrierInternalRole)
        Returns only internal or external roles only controlled by the boolean parameter passed in.
        Returns:
        returns either internal or external roles only, depending on the boolean parameter passed in

      • performSearch

        IQueryBeanResult performSearch()
        Performs a User search based on the passed-in criteria.
        Returns:
        a QueryProcessor containing the User search results

      • performSearchByProximity

        IQueryBeanResult performSearchByProximity(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location webLocation,
                                        ProximitySearchPageHelper inPsph)
        Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Results are returned as a query of UserBase entities.
        Parameters:
        webLocation - the Pebbles/PCF location within the UI. This must be null if this is being called from a scripting context.
        inPsph - the ProximitySearchPagerHelper object from the calling page within the ui. This must be null if this is being called from a scripting context.
        Returns:
        a query of User entities

      • performSearchByProximity

        @Deprecated
IQueryBeanResult performSearchByProximity(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location webLocation)
        Deprecated. this will create a new helper each time the search is performed, use the method which accepts a helper to preserve that across calls
        Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Results are returned as a query of User(Base?) entities.
        Parameters:
        webLocation - the Pebbles/PCF location within the UI. This must be null if this is being called from a scripting context.
        Returns:
        a query of User entities

      • performSearchByProximity

        IQueryBeanResult performSearchByProximity()
        Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Results are returned as a query of User(Base?) entities.
        Returns:
        a query of User entities

      • performSearchByProximityForAssignmentCandidateUsers

        IQueryBeanResult performSearchByProximityForAssignmentCandidateUsers(Key[] groupIds,
                                                                   SystemPermissionType[] requiredPermissions)
        Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Excludes users that are inactive or lack required permissions. Results are returned as a query of UserBase entities.
        Parameters:
        groupIds - If not null or empty, the list will be used to restrict to search on users with
        requiredPermissions - permissions that users must have
        Returns:
        a query of User entities

      • performSearchWithOrganization

        IQueryBeanResult performSearchWithOrganization()
        Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established, but requires that an organization has been set and that the organization's id is not temporary.
        Returns:
        a QueryProcessor containing Users

      • performGroupUserSearch

        IQueryBeanResult performGroupUserSearch()
        Searches for visible UserGroups with users matching the last name and first name fields specified in the criteria. Visible user groups have groups that are in the same security zone(s) as the current user (see User#getGroupsInSecurityZones()) unless the user has the special "view all users" permission, in which case all groups are visible.

        Note that since this search takes its results from the UserGroup table, users with no groups will not be returned.

        Returns:
        all visible user groups that match the criteria
